page.title: 15TRADE (MOBILE SERVICES)
page.content: Mr K.Evans delivers milk on 4 days a week. The Arvonia bread van which also carries groceries comes on Mon, Thurs & Sat. A butcher's van from Dolgellau comes on Thurs & 1 from Machynlleth comes on Fri. A fish van comes on Tue. Nigel Roberts grocer & greengrocer of Machynlleth will take orders which are delivered on Thurs. The mobile libary comes roughly once a month with a good selection of books. Sunday papers are delivered by car on Sun mornings. Dustbins are emptied every Fri. The yearly collection of large rubbish has not taken place this year. Fuel is delivered by a coal merchant who lives in the village. NHS Prescriptions are delivered to the shop once a week.
